headline: Fannie, Freddie to Consider Alternatives to FICO Scores
summary: Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, two mortgage-finance firms that back nearly half of U.S. mortgages, will have to consider credit-score alternatives to Fair Isaac Corp.’s FICO score when determining a mortgage applicant’s creditworthiness.

headline: Dayton Police Provide Minute-by-Minute Timeline of Shooting

summary: In an effort to engage students, about 200 New York City teachers are exploring ways to help public-school students of all backgrounds see themselves in their lessons. This week they’re tackling computer science.

headline: PG&E Makes Final Push to Stay in Charge of Chapter 11
